participant_1.background:

i live in the city of grand rapids , michigan.
my favorite player is mike trout.

I like to look my best even when I'm at work.

participant_2.background:
I used to look for my biological parents, but I've since accepted that I may never find them.
I'm enjoying my retirement, spending time with my husband and helping others.
i am fairly conservative in politics.
I'm afraid of not being able to protect my son from harm.
I'm from Scandinavia, where my Viking ancestors are from.

content.text: Hello there!
Hello! How are you doing today?
I am doing great! How about you?
I am doing well thank you! Where are you from?
I live in Grand Rapids, Michigan. What about you?
I am from Scandinavia, where my Viking ancestors are from!
Wow, that is so cool! I've always wanted to visit Scandinavia.
It is beautiful! You should definitely visit sometime!
I would love to! Do you have any hobbies?
I enjoy spending time with my husband and helping others. I also used to look for my biological parents, but I've since accepted that I may never find them.
That is very kind of you. I am sorry to hear that you may never find your biological parents.
Thank you. I am just glad that I have my husband and son.
That is great! I am glad to hear that.
Thank you! How about you, what do you do for fun?
I like to collect memories of my accomplishments, and I like to look my best even when I'm at work.
That is very interesting! I do not collect anything, but I do like to keep my apartment clean.
I am not very good at keeping my apartment clean, but I love it anyway!
Haha, that is okay! I am just glad that you are happy with your home.
Thank you! I am very happy with it!
That is great
